document_data.name: Sull
document_data.mainbody: '''Sull''' is a semi-skilled [[fighter]] who works as a butcher in the South Ward of [[Waterdeep]].  After [[Icelin Tearn|Icelin Tearn's]] great-uncle was killed by [[Cerest Elenithil|Cerest Elenithil's]] men, Sull agreed to take Icelin to [[Mistshore]] to hide from Cerest and the City Watch.  He protected Icelin from Cerest and was seriously wounded in a battle with Cerest's henchmen.  Later, Sull journeyed out of Waterdeep with Icelin and [[Ruen Morleth]] on a quest to find a cure for Icelin's spellscar.
document_data.Equipment: Sull uses his butcher cleavers as his primary weapons.
document_data.Appearance: Sull is a huge man with frizzy red hair and muttonchop sideburns.
